ai-pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.1_0: Knowing a lustful nun consents to a lustful man making physical contact with her, how many years when she succeeds at the same time?
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.2_0: While a lustful nun consents to a lustful man making physical contact with her, three go forth:
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.3_0: resolution face-to-face, acting according to what has been admitted, and covering over as if with grass. ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.7:2.1_0: curds that they had asked for seven days:
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.7:2.2_0: curd that they had asked for seven days:
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.7:2.3_0: resolution face-to-face, acting according to what has been admitted, and covering over as if with grass.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.7:3.1_0: The seventh section consisting of the communal recitation is finished.
